```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(cdmAcm0012)
```

## Simulated Monitoring Dataset

```{r}
set.seed(123)
monitoring <- simulate_acm0012_dataset(3, observations_per_period = 4)
knitr::kable(head(monitoring))
```

## Applicability Checks

```{r}
check_waste_energy_fraction_acm0012(mean(monitoring$waste_energy_fraction))
check_baseline_continuation_acm0012(
  mean(monitoring$baseline_operating_hours),
  mean(monitoring$project_operating_hours)
)
check_metering_uncertainty_acm0012(max(monitoring$measurement_uncertainty))
```

## Emission Calculations

```{r}
period_summary <- aggregate_monitoring_periods(monitoring)
knitr::kable(period_summary)

estimate_emission_reductions_acm0012(monitoring)
```
